name: Cyber Crystal
description: This is a subsidiary token of BNX, The player can use BNX to buy heroes and thus produce Crystals. It is the currency game can be used in the CyberDargon game. For example, players can consume Crystals to reforge equipment, which is consumed when challenging a specific dungeon. Crystals can be obtained through the daily work of typical heroes, can also be obtained by disassembling equipment, or traded on the DEX platform.
